page.title: 20AREAS OF SPECIAL INTEREST
page.content: {ELMSLEY VILLAS and LODGE }are shown clearly on maps that are 10 years or more old.On the most up to date maps it is clear that Elmsley Villas have disappeared completely. All that remains of Elmsley Lodge is an old derelict building that a farmer uses for storing hay. These building were once the homes of the Manager, Deputy Manager and miners and their families that all worked at Rufford Pit. The families didn't like living there miles from shops and schools so they all moved out. {MELISSA HAYWOOD {
